node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，第 #1069 宗個案患者的兒子，1 月 19 日與母親、妹妹及哥哥（第 #1070 及 #1073 宗個案患者）前往巴基斯坦出席第 #1072 宗個案患者的婚禮。5 月 28 日與家人一同返港，由檢疫中心送院，一直沒出現病徵。
node.detail_en: Son of patient #1069, the patient has good past health and travelled to Pakistan along with her mother, younger sister, and elder brothers (patients #1070 and #1073) to attend the wedding ceremony of patient #1072 on January 19. He returned to Hong Kong on May 28 along with his family, was hospitalised from quarantine centre, and has developed no symptoms.

groups.description_zh: 疫情以來逾1,100人從巴基斯坦回港，當中33人確診，確診率接近3%，衛生防護中心指屬偏高水平。
groups.description_en: Residents stuck overseas have been steadily flying back to the city over the past few months, including 1,100 from Pakistan. So far 3% have tested positive for Covid-19, which the CHP called a “relatively high” rate compared with returnees from other countries.

node.remarks_zh: 與母親、妹妹及哥哥（第 #1069、#1070 及 #1073 宗個案患者）同行；曾於當地參與第 #1072 宗個案患者的婚禮
node.remarks_en: Travelled to Pakistan along with his mother, younger sister and elder brother (patients no. #1069, #1070 and #1073); attended the wedding banquet of patient no. #1072
